me, half asleep: tf you want bro

summary: I’m so happy that Horikoshi finally came out as a thirsty Shigaraki Fucker, I mean he had been dropping hints for a while now...
body: I’m so happy that Horikoshi finally came out as a thirsty Shigaraki Fucker, I mean he had been dropping hints for a while now but I’m glad that he chose to make it official and to share it with the world :’)

blog.name: myheroyoutubecomments
blog.title: Boku No Youtube Academia
blog.description: Youtube comments left on bnha youtube videos. Submissions welcome. Blog runs on queue. Disclaimer: I am not making fun of anyone whose comment I feature on this blog.

summary:
• ₊°✧︡ ˗ˏˋ kirishima eijirou ˎˊ˗

  @spilltheearlgrey said: “Hii! Would I be able to request Kirishima and ‘sunset’? Best wishes...
body:
• ₊°✧︡ ˗ˏˋ kirishima eijirou ˎˊ˗

@spilltheearlgrey said: “Hii! Would I be able to request Kirishima and ‘sunset’? Best wishes with the blog, I’m sure itll go great!”

thank you for your request, dearie!

∘⁺✧ mod vermillion

Your eyes are taking in the different shades of orange and red as the colours painted the sky, in awe and wonder, and with the smile tugging upon your lips, you were enjoying it too. Kirishima has his eyes on you.

You think the way the sun sets, the colours in the sky are beautiful. Kirishima sees you as the most beautiful thing everyone could lay their eyes on.

The way the colours reflected off your eyes and skin, creating an illusion of you glowing in bright red and orange, angelic, as the sky slowly darkens and the sun finally disappeared behind the horizon. Kirishima couldn’t keep his eyes off you. At that moment, how much he wants to cherish your time together; how much he wants to live forever with you.

He reached out and took your hand, fingers gently wrapping and almost entirely enclosing your own. When you looked up at him and smiled warmly; when you reached out with your free hand to place it on his cheek; when you leaned in and he meets you in the middle, and the way fireworks seem to go off in his stomach and the way his heart thuds against his ribcage, Kirishima realised.

He realised that he’s falling in love with you all over again.

reblog.comment:
• ₊°✧︡ ˗ˏˋ kirishima eijirou ˎˊ˗

blog.name: obito-is-love
blog.title: Obito Is Love
blog.description: An anime blog solely dedicated to my favorite art form! The majority of my posts are queued so that I don't spam the dashboard, as well as screenshots and music from my favorite osts that I've posted here. I like to capture my favorite moments from every episode I watch, hence the multiple screenshots per post. Apologies in advance for my obsessive tendencies! I tend to marathon shows.

Katsuki Bakugou / Izuku Midoriya fanfics on Ao3
Blog created April 2, 2019. No fics before this date will be archived.
This page is still under construction

title: Lyric Fic Ideas
description:
by bluegrass

A compilation of song lyrics I’ve changed here and there to fit with the ships (others to be added). Imagine a boy/ girl band. They’re singing and stuff. Open to anyone willing to write one out actually. That’d be cool.
